projects.title: ReconFavicon
projects.description: OSINT tool for identifying applications and tech stacks using favicon hashing. Used widely by researchers for recon and fingerprinting.

projects.title: Xposed
projects.description: Automated exploitation framework designed for practicing and testing security vulnerabilities across multiple categories.

projects.title: Hasher
projects.description: Lightweight multi-algorithm hashing utility built for quick integrity checks, security testing, and forensic workflows.

projects.title: PRISM
projects.description: Modular penetration testing helper tool featuring recon, enumeration, and automation components for security workflows.

projects.title: Nmap XML Visualizer
projects.description: A clean, browser-based visualizer for Nmap XML outputs. Helps simplify port and service analysis with an interactive UI.

projects.title: FFUF Contribution
projects.description: Contributor to FFUF, one of the most respected fuzzing tools in cybersecurity. Helped improve codebase through an approved pull request.
